row.entry: The amount of available swap space is less than the required minimum.
Add space to the swap device or partition.
Swap is not mounted on a block device or partition.
Add a separate device or partition for swap.

Master hosts only: The following paths do not exist:
/opt/serviced/var/backups /opt/serviced/var/isvcs
One or more required mount points do not have the required minimum space. This test does not examine space for thin pools.
One or more required mount points are mounted on the same device or partition.
Add devices or partitions for each required mount point.
The amount of space available on unused block storage devices is not enough for the host's specified role.

On master hosts, separate devices or partitions are required for Docker data and for application data. On delegate or collector hosts, a separate device is required for Docker data. For more information, see .
